1.text: Boil 2  c (470 ml) of water before reducing the heat.

2.text: Stir in 2 US tbsp (30 ml) of honey and let the solution cool.
2.vid: /3/3c/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Soak plant cuttings in the honey solution for 2-3 hours before planting them.

4.text: Push the gel out from an aloe vera leaf using a spoon.
4.vid: /b/b5/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Mash the gel in a cup until it has a watery consistency.
5.vid: /2/24/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Coat the bottom of your cutting in the aloe gel before you plant it.
6.vid: /1/16/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 6.360p.mp4

7.vid: /a/ab/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Mix the ground aspirin with 1  c (240 ml) of distilled water.

9.text: Dip your cuttings in the aspirin solution for 2-3 hours before you plant them.

10.text: Collect 2 cups (256 g) of young branches from a willow tree.

11.text: Cut the branches into 1 in (2.5 cm) pieces.
11.vid: /b/ba/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: Add the willow pieces to boiling water and let them soak for 24 hours.
12.vid: /d/db/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Pour the liquid from the pot into glass containers with lids.
13.vid: /5/50/Make Homemade Hormone Rooting Powder or Tonic Step 13.360p.mp4

14.text: Soak your cuttings in the willow solution for 2-3 hours before planting.
